sources.title: Jungle Drums (1943)
sources.description: Superman discovers a secret Nazi base in the jungle. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/jungle-drums-1943/

metadata.Plot: A jungle temple with hooded priest is really a Nazi military base which downs a plane bearing Lois Lane and some secret plans. Can Superman save her from human sacrifice?
metadata.Director: Dan Gordon, Orestes Calpini, Dave Fleischer
metadata.Writer: Joe Shuster, Jerry Siegel, Robert Little
metadata.Actors: Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck, Jack Mercer
